SELECT INTV.INTVW_SEQ
FROM CPES_INTVW INTV LEFT JOIN CPES_APPLIC AP ON INTV.APPLIC_SEQ = AP.APPLIC_SEQ LEFT JOIN CPES_VACANCY VAC ON AP.VACANCY_SEQ = VAC.VACANCY_SEQ LEFT JOIN CPES_COMPNY COMPNY ON VAC.COMPNY_SEQ = COMPNY.COMPNY_SEQ WHERE AP.RESUME_SEQ = #{resumeSeq} AND COMPNY.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND VAC.VACANCY_SEQ = #{vacancySeq}
